comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: 50k is not a bit of cash unless you are asking for a millionaire to lend you some. I smell ponzi few miles away on your post and your post construction is just a copy paste of your other thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5444009.msg61877516#msg61877516You will need collateral in able to have a loan here but obviously you will not provide one. Props to max 1000% return. You even beat the bank for promising this kind of return. GL!

comments.author: NICE.BIT
comments.body: we had a project for our own product sales people and a distributor had asked... frankly speaking with one of many... his offer was i'll take it for a year, do advertising and count the production... he wanted an extra 8% for that have from our share ....... why not !!we had offered it to an investor with 300% - he didn't think it was ok thought it was a scam because of 300% so that's ita lolkisses ****the project was good cuase the product waas HOT .......sales people 3%product boy wanted 5%its always differentproduktboy wasn't worth anything, the sales people ouich muchwe didn't do that but it's still open but has to give another match time and people ....market analysis was a lot....the one distributor extrapolated to all in one country was an amount of 36,000,000++ was not only one country plus few more products not publishedthanks yes letas talk=)
